document.full_text: oil rose 2 percent on tuesday in choppy trading after goldman sachs raised its price forecasts for brent crude, saying demand from economic growth will eat into stockpiles and opec spare capacity.
document.title: oil rises 2 percent as goldman boosts price forecast
lines_and_colors: oil rose 2 percent on tuesday in choppy trading after goldman sachs raised its price forecasts for brent crude, saying demand from economic growth will eat into stockpiles and opec spare capacity.
